thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Chateau International Development announces 2017 dividend payment

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Chateau International Development announces 2017 dividend payment

organizations.name: reuters) - chateau international development co ltd

text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Chateau International Development Co Ltd :
* Says it will use undistributed profit to pay cash dividends of T$0.4 per share to shareholders for 2017
* It will use undistributed profit to distribute stock dividend worth T$0.4 for every one share
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/RnDsy6
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
